question: What is the name of the administrative center of Cēsu novads (Cēsis county) in Latvia?
asked_question_translated: Cómo se llama el centro administrativo de Cēsu novads (condado de Cēsis) en Letonia?
answer: El centro administrativo de Cēsu novads en Letonia se llama Cēsis.
answer_translated_eng: The administrative centre of Cēsu novads in Latvia is called Cēsis.
